page.title: 20Daily life (cont)
page.content: I hate lunch times because you spend half the break queueing and the other half eating.In Art and Craft I finished my collage and made Christmas decorations. At 15.30 Emma and I sprinted home and got back in 5 minutes.At home Emma stayed at my house to play.It was really good because we made tropical fruit drinks,and watched T.V. It was really funny.At 16.30 Emma went home.I changed into my football kit and at 18.00 I went to football practice with Stephanie Heath.We got very cold,wet and tired but it was good.At 20.00 we went home.I got really bored.I had my tea and then I watched Channel Four news.Channel Four news is really interesting.Today they had a special on Anti-Apartheid.I watched the news till 20.30 then I went to bed.
